Locarno.title: Locarno
Locarno.byline: Locarno is a city at the northern end of Lake Maggiore in Switzerland.

Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National P.title: Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National Park
Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National P.byline: Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National Park straddles between Argyll and Bute to the west and Stirlingshire to the east.

Loch Ness.title: Loch Ness
Loch Ness.byline: Loch Ness is a lake or loch which runs for 23 miles (37 km) along the fault line of the Great Glen in the Scottish Highlands.

Lochristi.title: Lochristi
Lochristi.byline: Lochristi is a residential town of 22,000 inhabitants in East Flanders, known for its horticulture.

Lockport.title: Lockport
Lockport.byline: Lockport is a city in the Niagara Frontier of New York.

Locorotondo.title: Locorotondo
Locorotondo.byline: Locorotondo is a town in the province of Bari (BA) in the Italian region of Apulia (Puglia), Italy.

Lochem.title: Lochem
Lochem.byline: Lochem is a city of 34,000 people (2019) in the Achterhoek, the region in the east of the Dutch province of Gelderland.
